TextView.android:text: Issuance of No Objection Certificate for Special Recruitment Activity (SRA)

This Service through the Public Employment Service Office (PESO) assist Agencies in getting the No objection Certificate which can be used in conducting Special Recruitment Activity (SRA) in the Municipality of Kitaotao.
2. Certificate of Renewal of License from POEA (1 photocopy)
3. Business Permit and BIR Registration (1 photocopy)
4. Authority to Establish a Branch Office from POEA (1 photocopy)
5. Appointment of Recruitment Officer with valid I.D (1 original copy)
6. Updated Job Order Balances from POEA (1 photocopy)
8. Clearance Certificate from Department of Labor and Employment Provincial Field Office (1 photocopy)
1.2. Refer to the PESO Manager for interview and validation
2.1. Receive payment and issue Official Receipt
3.1. Receive and photocopy official Receipt and Prepare the Certificate
3.3. Signing of the Document by the Municipal Mayor
3.4. Log and Release the Document to the client
4. Receives the signed No Objection Certificate and Signs Log book.
4.1. Request clients to accomplish Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) form
5. Fill up Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) form and drop at the Feedback box.
